exceptions.tactic: intros X p A H1 H2.
intros X' p A H1 H2.
intros X' p' A H1 H2.
intros X' p' A' H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: The reference H2 was not found in the current environment.
The reference x was not found in the current environment.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
The reference H3 was not found in the current environment.
The reference H4 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros X p A H1 H2. destruct H2 as [x [H3 H4]]. exists x. split. - apply H3. - apply H4.
